INSERT INTO PlanEventTypes ( EVENTTYPENAME, ALLOWAMOUNTS, ALLOWPERCENTS ) VALUES ( #{eventTypeName}, #{allowAmmounts}, #{allowPercents} )

INSERT INTO PlanRuns ( PLANID, RUNDATE, AGE, REMAINING, DRAW, DRAWPERCENT, EARNINVEST, EARNWAGE, CONTRIBUTION, TAX, FEE ) VALUES ( #{planID}, #{runDate}, #{age}, #{remaining}, #{draw}, #{drawPercent}, #{earnInvest}, #{earnWage}, #{contribution}, #{tax}, #{fee} )

INSERT INTO PLANEVENTS ( PLANID, EVENTTYPEID, EVENTNAME, EVENTVALUE, EVENTVALUETYPE, STARTAGE, ENDAGE ) SELECT #{newPlanID} as PlanID, EVENTTYPEID, EVENTNAME, EVENTVALUE, EVENTVALUETYPE, STARTAGE, ENDAGE FROM PLANEVENTS PE WHERE PLANID = #{oldPlanID}
mapper.select: SELECT PlanID, PlanName, StartBalance, StartAge From Plans ORDER BY PlanName
SELECT PLanID, RunDate, Age, Remaining, Draw, DrawPercent, EarnInvest, EarnWage, Contribution, Tax, Fee From PlanRuns WHERE PlanID=#{value} ORDER BY Age
SELECT PlanID, PlanName, StartBalance, StartAge From Plans WHERE PlanName=#{value}
SELECT PlanID, PlanName, StartBalance, StartAge From Plans WHERE PlanID=#{value}

SELECT pe.PLanID, pe.EventTypeID, pet.EventTypeName, pe.EventName, pe.EventValue, pe.EventValueType, pe.StartAge, pe.EndAge From PlanEvents pe INNER JOIN PlanEventTypes pet on pe.EventTypeID = pet.EventTypeID WHERE pe.PlanID=#{value} ORDER BY pe.StartAge, pe.EndAge, pe.EventName

SELECT pe.PLanID, pe.EventTypeID, pet.EventTypeName, pe.EventName, pe.EventValue, pe.EventValueType, pe.StartAge, pe.EndAge From PlanEvents pe INNER JOIN PlanEventTypes pet on pe.EventTypeID = pet.EventTypeID WHERE pe.PlanID=#{planID} AND pe.EventName = #{eventName} ORDER BY pe.StartAge, pe.EndAge, pe.EventName
SELECT EventTypeID, EventTypeName, AllowAmounts, AllowPercents From PlanEventTypes ORDER BY EventTypeName

SELECT p.planname, pr.age, pr.remaining, pr.draw, pr.earninvest, pr.earnwage, pr.contribution, pr.tax, pr.fee, (pr.earnwage+pr.draw)-pr.tax as netearnings FROM planruns pr Inner join plans p ON pr.planid =p.planid WHERE pr.planid = #{value} ORDER BY pr.age
